an10.29:1.1: “Yavata, bhikkhave, kasikosala, yavata ranno pasenadissa kosalassa vijitam, raja tattha pasenadi kosalo aggamakkhayati.
an10.29:1.2: Rannopi kho, bhikkhave, pasenadissa kosalassa attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:1.3: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:1.4: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:2.1: Yavata, bhikkhave, candimasuriya pariharanti disa bhanti virocamana, tava sahassadha loko.
an10.29:2.2: Tasmim sahassadha loke sahassam candanam sahassam suriyanam sahassam sinerupabbatarajanam sahassam jambudipanam sahassam aparagoyananam sahassam uttarakurunam sahassam pubbavidehanam cattari mahasamuddasahassani cattari maharajasahassani sahassam catumaharajikanam sahassam tavatimsanam sahassam yamanam sahassam tusitanam sahassam nimmanaratinam sahassam paranimmitavasavattinam sahassam brahmalokanam.
an10.29:2.3: Yavata, bhikkhave, sahassi lokadhatu, mahabrahma tattha aggamakkhayati.
an10.29:2.4: Mahabrahmunopi kho, bhikkhave, attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:2.5: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:2.6: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:3.1: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yam ayam loko samvattati.
an10.29:3.2: Samvattamane, bhikkhave, loke yebhuyyena satta abhassarasamvattanika bhavanti.
an10.29:3.3: Te tattha honti manomaya pitibhakkha sayampabha antalikkhecara subhatthayino ciram dighamaddhanam titthanti.
an10.29:3.4: Samvattamane, bhikkhave, loke abhassara deva aggamakkhayanti.
an10.29:3.5: Abhassaranampi kho, bhikkhave, devanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:3.6: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:3.7: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:4.3: Pathavikasinameko sanjanati uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam;
an10.29:4.12: vinnanakasinameko sanjanati uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
an10.29:5.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dasannam kasinayatananam yadidam vinnanakasinam eko sanjanati uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
an10.29:5.3: Evamsanninampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:5.4: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:5.5: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:6.3: Ajjhattam rupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani;
an10.29:7.1: Ajjhattam rupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani;
an10.29:8.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani;
an10.29:9.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani;
an10.29:10.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani.
an10.29:10.2: Seyyathapi nama umapuppham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam;
an10.29:10.3: evamevam ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani;
an10.29:11.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani.
an10.29:11.2: Seyyathapi nama kanikarapuppham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam;
an10.29:11.3: evamevam ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani;
an10.29:12.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani.
an10.29:12.2: Seyyathapi nama bandhujivakapuppham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam;
an10.29:12.3: evamevam ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani;
an10.29:13.1: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani.
an10.29:13.2: Seyyathapi nama osadhitaraka odata odatavanna odatanidassana odatanibhasa, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham odatam odatavannam odatanidassanam odatanibhasam;
an10.29:13.3: evamevam ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani;
an10.29:14.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam atthannam abhibhayatananam yadidam ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani;
an10.29:14.4: Evamsanninampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:14.5: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:14.6: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:16.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam patipadanam yadidam sukha patipada khippabhinna.
an10.29:16.3: Evampatipannanampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:16.4: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:16.5: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:18.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam sannanam yadidam ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanameko sanjanati.
an10.29:18.3: Evamsanninampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:18.4: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:18.5: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:19.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, bahirakanam ditthigatanam yadidam ‘no cassam, no ca me siya, na bhavissami, na me bhavissati’ti.
an10.29:19.3: ‘ya cayam bhave appatikulyata, sa cassa na bhavissati;
an10.29:19.4: ya cayam bhavanirodhe patikulyata, sa cassa na bhavissati’ti.
an10.29:19.6: Evamditthinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:19.7: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:19.8: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:20.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana paramatthavisuddhim pannapenti.
an10.29:20.2: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, paramatthavisuddhim pannapentanam yadidam sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an10.29:20.3: Te tadabhinnaya tassa sacchikiriyaya dhammam desenti.
an10.29:20.5: Evamvadinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattanam attheva annathattam atthi viparinamo.
an10.29:20.6: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako tasmimpi nibbindati.
an10.29:20.7: Tasmim nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hinasmim.
an10.29:21.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana paramaditthadhammanibbanam pannapenti.
an10.29:21.2: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, paramaditthadhammanibbanam pannapentanam yadidam channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupada vimokkho.
an10.29:21.3: Evamvadim kho mam, bhikkhave, evamakkhayim eke samanabrahmana asata tuccha musa abhutena abbhacikkhanti:
an10.29:21.4: ‘samano gotamo na kamanam parinnam pannapeti, na rupanam parinnam pannapeti, na vedananam parinnam pannapeti’ti.
an10.29:21.5: Kamanancaham, bhikkhave, parinnam pannapemi, rupananca parinnam pannapemi, vedanananca parinnam pannapemi, dittheva dhamme nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto anupada parinibbanam pannapemi”ti.
